properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Niagara River to Hamlin Beach NY beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 10 at 4:57AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds to 40 knots and waves 10 to 14 feet possible.

* WHERE...The open waters of Lake Ontario from the Niagara River
to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
